data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 44 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Ngiwal.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ngiwal, Palau
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 44 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, help your children in Ngiwal, Palau find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: the state of Ngiwal has (about) 44 people who know Jesus, 147 people who know about him culturally, and 9 people who are far from Jesus.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ngerkeai
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ngerkeai, Ngiwal, Palau.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Ngiwal.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Ngiwal.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ngiwal, Palau has a population of 200.

We estimate Ngiwal has 44 people who might know Jesus, 147 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ngiwal, Palau to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
